rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {MKP5770, MKT6251, MKX5111, MKX5251, MKX5251%, X3407}
Unit was previously coded {MKP5770, MKT6251, MKX5111, MKX5251, MKX5251%, X3407}
Must have passed 42 credit points at levels {4, 5, 9}
Must be enrolled in course version {2276, 3802, 3810, 4431}
Must be enrolled in course version {2276, 4431}

description: Using the case study method this unit provides an analytical framework from which students can explore how marketing strategy is applied to a variety of organisations within the context of contemporary and emerging issues. Students will be taught how to analyse, evaluate and implement marketing strategy. As this is the capstone unit in the Master of Marketing degree course, a theoretical grounding in the earlier core marketing units is essential for students undertaking this unit.
